item.title: Keel-Tao Estimates on Subset of Variables
item.description: Consider the Schrödinger operator e^{i t \Delta} on \mathbb{R}^d = \mathbb{R}^n_x \oplus \mathbb{R}^m_y, where n + m = d.

item.title: Important Exponents in Restriction Theory
item.description: Here we are working with restriction operators for curved hypersurfaces of dimension n in \mathbb{R}^d.

item.title: Calculations With The Shape Operator II
Calculations With The Shape Operator
item.description: Let \Sigma be an orientable surface in \mathbb{R}^d. Then we can consider a normal vector field n: \Sigma \to S^{d-1} to \Sigma.

item.title: Induction on Scales
item.description: Suppose C(R) is a finite quantity chosen for each integer R > 0, such that, by some (hopefully trivial) argument, we can justify C(R) = R^{O(1)}.

item.title: Simultaneous Saturation
item.description: Suppose that T_1,\dots,T_M are operators, with T_i mapping elements of a Hilbert space H_i to functions on a set X, where \| T_i \|_{H_i \to L^2(X)} \lesssim B.

item.title: Rapidly Decaying Wave Packet Weights
item.description: TODO With translation invariance, can go from local estimates to weighted estimates, so that the inequalities can be composed.

item.title: Reverse Hölder's Inequality For Fourier Localized Functions
item.description: Suppose g_1,\dots,g_k are functions with Fourier transform supported on balls of radius R.

item.title: Local Constancy Heuristics and the Uncertainty Principle
item.description: Let f be a function whose Fourier transform is supported on the ball \{ \xi : |\xi| \leq R \}.

item.title: Broad-Narrow Analysis
item.description: We aim to obtain a bound \| Ef \|_{L^p(B_R)} \lessapprox \| f \|_{L^p(\Sigma)} by using multilinear restriction estimates and decoupling estimates.
